testcase.name: User attempts to login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the Paribu homepage...................................passed When I close the cookie notification......................................passed And I click on the login button...........................................passed And I fill in the login form with invalid credentials.....................passed And I submit the login form...............................................passed Then I should see an error message indicating invalid credentials.........passed

testcase.name: Check total price calculation
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the Paribu homepage...................................passed When I close the cookie notification......................................passed And I navigate to the Markets page........................................passed And I select the FAN filter...............................................passed And I set the price change time range to 12 hours.........................passed And I click on the 3rd cryptocurrency in the list.........................passed And I enter the current price in the Unit Price field.....................passed And I enter 5 in the Amount field.........................................passed Then the total price should be correctly calculated.......................passed
